sentences.english: Get out the phone book or check at your local library.
sentences.chinese: 在电话本上或者到当地图书馆去找。

sentences.english: The Culture of the south of the River have deep roots in the colloquial stories.
sentences.chinese: 话本小说与江南文化有着很深的渊源关系。

sentences.english: This key Holds 250 telephone directory records.
sentences.chinese: 这种钥匙保存250个电话本记录。

sentences.english: She looked up his number in the phone rent to make sure thsupportshe hlisting got it right.
sentences.chinese: 她在电话本里查找他的电话号码以确保之前输出准确。

sentences.english: I'm going to save it in my address list.
sentences.chinese: 我要把它存在我的电话本里。

sentences.english: By telling "Pusa Man" have "the emperor Gojong maternal uncles Wu 7 Prince.
sentences.chinese: 按话本《菩萨蛮》有“高宗皇帝母舅吴七郡王”。

sentences.english: Ling Mengchu and Li Yu are all masters of NiHuaBen.
sentences.chinese: 凌蒙初与李渔都是拟话本小说的大家。

sentences.english: Storytelling novels originated from the works of folklore speakers and marketplace writers.
sentences.chinese: 话本小说滥觞于说话艺人和市井文人之作。

sentences.english: Find your local chapter in your phone book or through redcross. org.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过电话本或者红十字协会找到当地组织。

sentences.english: Chaoshan if this is the ancient Chinese language in the Central Plains to wave a product of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕话本是古代中原汉人语言在潮地衍变的产物。

sentences.english: At the same time, the style and features of canal towns in south China also offer a unique narrative space to the vernacular novels.
sentences.chinese: 同时，江南水乡又为话本小说提供了别致的叙事空间。

sentences.english: I've got to get the number from the book in the kitchen, she told herself.
sentences.chinese: 我得从厨房里的电话本里找到号码，她对自己说。

sentences.english: Some people never read a newspaper, let alone a book.
sentences.chinese: 有些人从未读过报纸，更不用平话本了。

sentences.english: A boaster and a liar are cousin.
sentences.chinese: 吹牛与说谎话本是同宗。

definition: folk art consisting of storytelling to music
Romance of the West Chamber by Wang Shifu 王實甫|王实甫[Wang2 Shi2 fu3]
storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
a Yuan dynasty form of musical comedy
Stories Old and New by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2], collection of late Ming baihua 白話|白话[bai2 hua4] tales published in 1620
historical tales
Sanxia wuyi (lit. Three knight-errants and five righteous one), novel edited from stories of late Qing dynasty pinghua 評話|评话 master storyteller Shi Yukun 石玉昆
novel in chapters, main format for long novels from the Ming onwards, with each chapter headed by a summary couplet
actor's lines (in theater)
form of writing novels that comprise lots of poetry in the body of the text, popular in the Ming Dynasty
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
popular fiction/light literature
Stories to Awaken the World, vernacular short stories by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2] published in 1627
pingshu, a folk art where a single performer narrates stories from history or fiction
another name for 古今小說|古今小说[Gu3 jin1 Xiao3 shuo1], Stories Old and New by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2]
Feng Menglong (1574-1646), late Ming dynasty novelist writing in colloquial (baihua), author of Stories Old and New 古今小說|古今小说[Gu3 jin1 Xiao3 shuo1]
